meanings.definition: A cooking range on a ship.
meanings.sent1: The sailors gathered around the cambooses to cook their meals.
meanings.sent2: The ship's cambooses were used to prepare delicious meals for the crew.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally dropped his hat into the cambooses, causing a lot of laughter.
meanings.sent4: The cambooses on the ship were like magical cauldrons, producing warm and hearty dishes.
meanings.sent5: The fiery flames of the cambooses lit up the deck, creating a cozy atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The sailors stored their supplies in the cambooses on the deck.
meanings.sent2: The cambooses were painted in bright colors to stand out on the ship.
meanings.sent3: As the storm approached, the cambooses seemed to huddle together for safety.
meanings.sent4: The cambooses lined up in a row, resembling colorful little houses on the ship.
meanings.sent5: The crew members relied on the cambooses to keep their belongings safe during the voyage.
